edu.ub.prog2.utils

Class ReproductorVisorBasic

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ub.prog2.utils.ReproductorVisorBasic

  • public abstract class ReproductorVisorBasic
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements a motor for playing audio/video and showing images (based on Vlcj).
